mapper.select: SELECT main_classify_id,sub_classify_id,sub_classify_name,status from sub_classify where status = TRUE GROUP BY main_classify_id ORDER BY sub_classify_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sub_classify(sub_classify_name, status, main_classify_id) VALUES (#{subClassifyName},#{status},#{mainClassifyId})
mapper.select: select c.classify_id,c.classify_name,s.sub_classify_id,s.sub_classify_name from sub_classify s,classify c where s.main_classify_id = c.classify_id and s.status = 1 and c.status = 1 order by c.classify_id,s.sub_classify_id
